label: 関東往還記
対訳語: Back and Forth to the Kantō Region
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: Record written by Shōkai, a disciple of Eizon, of a trip from Nara to the Kantō region on which he accompanied Eizon in 1262 (p. 29).　［性海、叡尊]
